participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: introverted and imaginative, with a penchant for fantasy worlds.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: outgoing and adventurous, with a love for fast cars and social gatherings.
participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i have never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home.
